full_summary:
### Notice of Proposed Procurement for 16" MacBook Pro's

#### Table of Contents

*   [Pre-Proposal Requirements](#pre-proposal-requirements)
*   [Technical Description](#technical-description)
*   [Evaluation Criteria](#evaluation-criteria)

#### Pre-Proposal Requirements

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is soliciting proposals for the procurement of five [Apple 16-inch MacBook Pro's or equivalent](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login).
